titles.title: Restoring America's Competitiveness in Enterprise (RACE) Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce the maximum rate of tax on the income of corporations to 20 percent.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/25/2011--Introduced. Restoring America's Competitiveness in Enterprise (RACE) Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, to 20% of taxable income over $50,000.
